DescribeAccountBalance.document: This API is used to check the Tencent Cloud account balance.
DescribeAccountBalance.name: Checks account balance

DescribeBillDetail.document: This API is used to query bill details.
DescribeBillDetail.name: Queries bill details

DescribeBillResourceSummary.document: This API is used to query bill resources summary.

PayDeals.document: This API is used to pay orders
PayDeals.name: Pays orders

FailedOperation.AgentPayDealCannotDown.document: Device paid by reseller cannot be degraded.

FailedOperation.InvalidDeal.document: Order status error. Only unpaid orders can be paid.

FailedOperation.NeedPayTogeter.document: Orders purchased together must be paid at the same time.

FailedOperation.PayPriceError.document: Payment failed, contact Tencent Cloud staff to resolve this issue.

FailedOperation.PaySuccDeliverFailed.document: Payment was successful but delivery failed. Contact Tencent Cloud staff to resolve this issue.

FailedOperation.SummaryDataNotReady.document: Summary is in compilation. Please try again later.

UnauthorizedOperation.NotCertification.document: The account has not completed identity verification. Payment failed.

UnauthorizedOperation.NotFinanceAuth.document: The account has not been authorized for financial transactions. Payment failed.

Product code

members.document: Cost ratio, to two decimal points

members.document: "Display available balance" field under account information (in cents)
members.name: Balance

members.document: Unique ID of the request. Each request returns a unique ID. The RequestId is required to troubleshoot issues.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The period type. byUsedTime: By usage period; byPayTime: By payment period. Must be the same as the period of the current monthly bill of the Billing Center. You can check your bill statistics period type at the top of the [Bill Overview](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/expense/bill/overview) page.
members.name: PeriodType

members.document: Month; format: yyyy-mm. You only have to enter either Month or BeginTime and EndTime. When you enter values for BeginTime and EndTime, Month becomes invalid. This value must be no earlier than March 2019, when Bill 2.0 was launched; only the last 24 months data can be retrieved.
members.name: Month

members.document: The start time of the period; format: Y-m-d H:i:s. You only have to enter either Month or BeginTime and EndTime. When you enter values for BeginTime and EndTime, Month becomes invalid. BeginTime and EndTime must be inputted as a pair. This value must be no earlier than March 2019, when Bill 2.0 was launched; only the last 24 months data can be retrieved.
members.name: BeginTime

members.document: The end time of the period; format: Y-m-d H:i:s. You only have to enter either Month or BeginTime and EndTime. When you enter values for BeginTime and EndTime, Month becomes invalid. BeginTime and EndTime must be inputted as a pair. This value must be no earlier than March 2019, when Bill 2.0 was launched; only the last 24 months data can be retrieved.
members.name: EndTime

members.document:
Indicates whether the total number of records is required, used for pagination.
1 = yes, 0 = no
members.name: NeedRecordNum

members.document:
Total number of records
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid value was found.
members.name: Total

members.name: RequestId

members.document: Number of lines of data per page. Default is 20, maximum is 1,000.

members.name: Offset

members.document:
Order status. Default is 4 (successful orders)
Order status
1. Unpaid
2. Paid 3. In delivery
4. Delivered
5. Delivery failed
6. Refunded
7. Closed
8. Order expired
9. Order invalid
10. Product invalid
11. Proxy payment rejected
12. In payment
members.name: Status

members.document: Unique ID of the request. Each request returns a unique ID. The RequestId is required to troubleshoot issues.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Queries bill start date, such as 2019-01-01
members.name: StartDate

members.document: Queries bill end date, such as 2019-01-01. Time span cannot exceed 7 days.
members.name: EndDate

members.document:
ILVB:
10194   ILVB-Core data center
10195   ILVB-Edge data center

CDN:
10180: CDN static acceleration traffic (Mainland China)
10181: CDN static acceleration bandwidth (Mainland China)
10182: CDN standard static acceleration traffic
10183: CDN standard static acceleration bandwidth
10231: CDN static acceleration traffic (Global)
10232: CDN static acceleration bandwidth (Global)

100967: EIP (Bill-by-traffic)
101065: Public Network Cloud Load Balancer (Bill-by-traffic)

LVB
10226 LVB traffic (Mainland China)
10227 LVB bandwidth (Mainland China)
100763 LVB traffic (Global)
100762 LVB bandwidth (Global)

Value is blank when querying non-CDN service
